post.text: Thank you to the great crowd of supporters in Newtown, Pennsylvania tonight! Get out & VOTE on 11/8/16. Lets MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Makayla
comment.text: Here's some fun facts for ya! During President Obama's two terms, our national debt has ballooned to $20,000,000,000,000 (that's 20 TRILLION dollars) If you were to stack 20 trillion dollars in 100 dollar bills that would cover over 13,573 miles!!!!!! That would be the same as driving from Philadelphia to Southern California back to Philadelphia back to Southern California back to Philadelphia and back to Southern California!!!!!! FIVE cross-country trips, folks!!!!!

replies.author: Brianna
replies.text: Obama is the WORST President in History and quite possibly the poorest Businessman and Clueless to Boot.

replies.author: Edan
replies.text: Just think of all the waste, fraud, missing money in Iraq, duplication of services, stupid funding for pork projects that service no good purpose other then giving a person a job that is overpay to do a ketchup survey for example & etc.

replies.author: Edan
replies.text: Broomstick One we are going to Stop you and your Corruption come Nov.8th. Trump Train is a Comin' ..... Spread the word Visually .... Everyone should change their Profile Picture to Trump!!! Wouldn't that be a Big Statement to the World. Unite the Trump Supporters! ..... Vote Nov. 8th for Trump.

replies.author: Malari
replies.text: Based on pure astrology who will actually win this presidential election? To find out go to YouTube and put Malari on it. Then you'll see an amazing future prediction.
